::: TRANSANULAS set's QUICKSTRIKE's leg and then returns to his beast mode 
and resumes conversation :::

::: He looked around after a predators cry was silenced by the scream of its 
prey ::: I know your emotions...and I know Black Aracnia's. You forget i have 
a unique psychie....telepathic abilities. Most of the time I can sense the 
emotions of others but with a few weak minded...bts such as Black Aracnia, I 
can talk to them mentally. Observe.

::: He closed his eyes and began to whisper :::

~~~~~~~~~~

::: HELL BEAST, violently swearing made his way to the shiled. Auto-guns 
fired all about him, but he was determined. ABout 5 meters away, he tossed 
and electro-drainer grenade. When it detonated, it would send an electric web 
all over the shield, draining it. ::::

::: With the bomb tossed, HELL BEAST got up only to be shot by an auto-gun 
that flung him to where GREMLIN, BLACK ARACNIA, and JACKLE took cover from 
battle :::

::: GREMLIN ::: Shesh, damn Maximals! 

::: JACKLE, holding the detenator ::: When should i push it boss?

::: HELL BEAST stumbling to his feet ::: Push it, now!

::: The bomb exploded, and as predicted an electro web formed over the shield 
draining its power :::

::: HELL BEAST ::: Excellent....

~~~~~~~~~~~

::: BLACK ARACNIA, in between blasts suddenly felt a darkness forming within 
the back of her mind. And the faint voice that told her to come to the 
swamp.....but why?:::

::: BALCK ARACNIA shook it away, but the calling became stronger ::::
